revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)

|cpu1_cores = 10 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53-A72{{#set:Fix me=Fix CPU cores}} |cpu1spd = 1.4-2.3 GHz |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit |flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = |fla1chip = SK hynix;H26M41204HPR; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = LPDDR3 |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H9CKNNNBKTMR-PRNUH; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_none = true |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;4.7.0;Android 6; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot, HDMI |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 8-18 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 4.8 |pwr_barrel_inner = 1.7 |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = Bluetooth 4.1, GPS, Glonass, MicroSD Card slot, HDMI, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, UART, I2C, GPIO, SPI, I2S |addchip = PMIC/Audio Codec;MediaTek;MT6351;;1;,,, Peripheral Bridge IC;MediaTek;MT8193;;1;,,, 3-port USB Hub Controller;SMSC;USB2513BI;;1;,,, 1.5A Ultra Low-Dropout Linear Regulator;Richtek;RT9183;;1;,,, 4.5V to 18V 6A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54628;;2;,,, 10A Synchronous Dual Step-Down Converter;Dialog Semi;DA9214;;1;,,, 5A 2MHz Step-Down Switching Voltage Regulator;ON Semi;FAN53200;;1;,,, 28V Over-Voltage/Current Protection Load Switch;ON Semi;FPF2495;;1;,,, Dual SPDT USB Switch;Toshiba;TC7USB40MU;;1;,,, USB OTB Protection IC;TI;TPD4S214;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = ArcherMind |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 07/2016 |estprice = 200 |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B073QNPH21 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = |rad1modif = SDIO |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT6631N; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "MediaTek X20 Development Board" is silkscreened on the board top. :"96Boards" is silkscreened on the board bottom. ===Hardware specifications=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT6797 ''Helio X20'' (Deca Core) :2x ARM (Cortex-A72) @2.1-2.3GHz :4x ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.85GHz :4x ARM (Cortex-A53) @1.4GHz *GPU: ARM Mali-T880 @700MHz *Storage: 8GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash, :microSD Card 3.0 (UHS-I) slot *RAM: 2GB LPDDR3 @933 MHz *WLAN: 802.11abgn/ac (1T1R) ==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/06/27/MediaTek-labs-unveils-deca-core-helio-x20-development-board-compliant-with-96boards-ce-specifications/ ''MediaTek Labs Unveils Deca-core Helio X20 Development Board
Compliant with 96Boards CE Specifications'' on '''CNX|Soft'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/MediaTeks-96boards-sbc-showcases-deca-core-helio-x20/ ''96Boards SBC showcases MediaTek's deca-core Helio X20'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://labs.MediaTek.com/en/platform/MediaTek-x20 ''MediaTek X20 Development Board'' on '''MediaTek labs'''] [[Category:English Documentation]]
